伖字的基本解释

伖
tǎng
古同“帑”。

伖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tǎng］
［《廣韻》他朗切，上蕩，透。］
亦作“伖1”。
(1)财帛。
(2)指藏金帛的府库。
(3)囊。
(4)掠取。
[②]［nú］
［《廣韻》乃都切，平模，泥。］
亦作“伖2”。
(1)通“孥”。儿女的通称。
(2)用以指妻子和儿女。
(3)通“孥”。俘虏；奴隶。
(4)通“孥”。鸟尾。
(5)雌。
(6)通“弩”。参见“帑2抹”。

伖字的康熙字典解释

【補遺】【子集】【人字部】　伖； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页96第12
【韻會】與帑同。

伖字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
伖字的起名意思

暂无。

Tong
Basic explanation of words
Tong
tǎng
Gu Tong "pooh".
Tong
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tǎng］
["Guangyun" He is cut, up and down, and through. ]
Also referred to as "弖1".
(1) Caibo.
(2) Refers to the treasury of gold and silk.
(3) The capsule.
(4) Looting.
[②] [nú]
["Guangyun" is all cut, flat mold, clay. ]
Also known as "Zhou 2".
(1) Through "孥". Generic term for children.
(2) Used to refer to wives and children.
(3) Through "孥". Captive; slave.
(4) Through "孥". Bird tail.
(5) Female.
(6) Through "crossbow". See "Pooh 2 Wipe".
Tong
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Addendum] [Subset] [The Department of Human Characters] 　伖; Kangxi Strokes: 6; Page Number: Page 96-12
[Rhyme Club] Same as Ba.
